select prl.print_label_id as printLabelId, prl.package_id as packageId, m1.material_no as materialNo, m1.material_name as materialName, m1.material_desc as materialDesc, prl.num as num from sm_storage s left join om_pick_head ph on s.source_no = ph.source_no left join om_pick_label pl on ph.pick_head_id = pl.pick_head_id left join si_print_label prl on pl.print_label_id = prl.print_label_id left join si_material m1 on prl.material_id = m1.material_id where s.dr = 1 and s.storage_id = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT} and prl.print_label_id is not null

select m.material_id as materialId, m.material_no as materialNo, m.material_name as materialName, m.material_desc as materialDesc, pb.pick_num as pickNum from sm_storage s left join om_pick_head ph on s.source_no = ph.source_no left join om_pick_body pb on ph.pick_head_id = pb.pick_head_id left join si_material m on pb.material_id = m.material_id where s.dr = 1 and s.storage_id = #{storageId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and m.material_id is not null

select prl.package_id from sm_storage s left join om_pick_head ph on s.source_no = ph.source_no left join om_pick_body pb on ph.pick_head_id = pb.pick_head_id left join si_material m on pb.material_id = m.material_id left join om_pick_label pl on pb.pick_head_id = pl.pick_head_id left join si_print_label prl on pl.print_label_id = prl.print_label_id where s.dr = 1 and s.storage_id = #{storageId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and pb.material_id = prl.material_id
